CustomField.description: The ending date to include credit data for the generation of hard credit receipts. Adjusted by gift entry staff on a regular basis. Used in CRMA to pull in the correct population of records by date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The ending date to include credit data for the generation of hard credit receipts. Adjusted by gift entry staff on a regular basis. Used in CRMA to pull in the correct population of records by date.
CustomField.label: Hard Credit Receipt Gen. End Date
